definition: intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)

sentences.english: General lithographic, gravure, flexo printing, and varnish process after printing.
sentences.chinese: 一般平版，凹版，凸版印刷及印後上光油加工。

sentences.english: Gravure printing is big in China and Japan, above all because of the large print runs common in those countries.
sentences.chinese: 在中國和日本，凹版印刷佔據著重要的位置。

sentences.english: Perchloride of iron used to etch gravure cylinders. Alernative term: etchant .
sentences.chinese: 中義腐蝕凹版輥筒的高氯酸鐵。

sentences.english: Acetone Volatile, fast-drying solvent used mainly in gravure inks.
sentences.chinese: 揮發及快乾溶劑，主要用於照相凹版油墨。

sentences.english: The author expounds operating steps of color matching of gravure ink in detail.
sentences.chinese: 作者最後還對凹版油墨調色的操作步驟作了詳細介紹。

sentences.english: The importance of determining reasonable hot-air drying parameters for gravure was expounded.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了確定合理凹版熱風乾燥參數的重要性。

sentences.english: Two methods have been proposed to test the intaglio printings on banknotes by optical fiber sensors.
sentences.chinese: 提出了兩種用光纖傳感器測試紙幣凹版印刷的方案。

sentences.english: The company is a supplier of offset and rotogravure printing machines.
sentences.chinese: 該公司是一家膠印和凹版印刷機的供應商。

sentences.english: One of a family of organic solvents used in flexographic and gravure inks.
sentences.chinese: 中義用在樹脂版或凹版印墨的有機溶劑。

sentences.english: The setting between the doctor blade and the engraved gravure cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 中義墨槽刮刀與凹版輥筒間角度的設定值。

sentences.english: It is common to mix gravure and web offset forms in the same issue.
sentences.chinese: 這是常見的組合凹版印刷和輪轉的形式相同的問題。

sentences.english: Depending on the requirement, either letter-press printing blocks or gravure printing places can be produced.
sentences.chinese: 視乎需要，它可以造成供凸版或凹版印刷用的印版。

sentences.english: Tianjin Hand-all Packaging & Printing Co. , Ltd. is a professionally Rotogravure Printers company.
sentences.chinese: 專業生產大型特種凹版印刷包裝製品。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to printing machine, and is especially a kind of intaglio proofing press.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及印刷機械技術領域，特指一種凹版打樣機。

sentences.english: Volatile, fast-drying solvent used mainly in gravure inks.
sentences.chinese: 揮發及快乾溶劑，主要用於照相凹版油墨。

sentences.english: Intaglio business card printing and membership card.
sentences.chinese: 凹版制卡和會員卡製作。

definition: color printing using several overlaid images
color printing using several overlaid images
